data.lyric:
[ti:SUMMER]
[ar:The Carters]
[al:EVERYTHING IS LOVE (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]SUMMER (Explicit) - The Carters
[00:00.99]Lyricist：Beyoncé/S. Carter/Marcello Valenzano/Andre Christopher Lyon/L. Michels/H. Steinweiss/T. Brenneck/M. Herard/James Fauntleroy II
[00:01.99]Composer：Beyoncé/S. Carter/Marcello Valenzano/Andre Christopher Lyon/L. Michels/H. Steinweiss/T. Brenneck/M. Herard/James Fauntleroy II
[00:02.99]Rory：
[00:03.99]Right now inside the place to be with the one JAY-Z and Bey
[00:07.65]Slowing down the dance to a different type of speed
[00:15.41]You know it's Cool & Dre deh pan the beat
[00:18.54]You know a bloodclaat heat
[00:21.55]Right
[00:23.28]Beyoncé/JAY-Z：
[00:28.57]Let's make love in the summertime yeah
[00:32.66]On the sands beach sands make plans
[00:35.75]To be in each other's arms yeah
[00:39.20]Let it breathe let it breathe
[00:42.83]I wanna drown in the depth of you yeah yeah
[00:48.76]When the water's so blue so blue so blue
[00:53.71]So blue so blue
[00:58.42]I need to take my time oh yeah
[01:02.87]Show you somethin' real so real
[01:06.21]So real let it breathe so real let it breathe so real
[01:12.84]I want you to come inside right now
[01:16.75]So you know just how I feel
[01:21.44]How I feel let it breathe let it breathe yeah
[01:23.98]Beyoncé：
[01:24.18]We never been this far from the shore
[01:27.56]We might not ever go back anymore
[01:30.97]Got you all in your emotions hit you with the force then
[01:34.85]Tell me your desires I won't ever tire
[01:38.35]You'd rather play the game than to throw the fight
[01:43.21]Boy you know that ain't right
[01:45.18]When I'm needing your affection I need that attention
[01:48.81]Up and down motion come swim in my ocean yeah yeah
[01:53.27]Beyoncé/JAY-Z：
[01:53.66]Let's make love in the summertime yeah
[01:57.47]On the sands beach sands make plans
[02:00.39]To be in each other's arms
[02:03.69]Let it breathe let it breathe
[02:07.64]I wanna drown in the depth of you yeah yeah yeah yeah
[02:13.18]Where the water's so blue
[02:17.58]So blue so blue
[02:20.92]JAY-Z：
[02:21.24]I brought my sand to the beach
[02:23.15]Hopped out the Lam' with the sheep
[02:24.87]Skin rugs on the floor
[02:26.41]We hugged made love on the seats
[02:28.33]We tried to hide in the hills
[02:30.16]We watched the sky turn peach
[02:31.81]Summer's light like summer's night
[02:33.31]It's like Christ masterpiece
[02:35.54]She taste like Corona Light sweet
[02:37.67]Even the lime gotta squeeze
[02:39.01]She gave me a lil' swig to chase behind my weed
[02:42.40]If I can stay in her hair forever that'd be fine by me
[02:45.88]I don't have no concept of time
[02:47.30]Even with a rose gold Concept on me
[02:49.68]I remember summer nights in the projects
[02:51.46]Bullet rounds interrupting my Chi
[02:53.25]When the worst thing that could happen
[02:54.38]Zipped up his jacket and ran back down the street
[02:56.52]In Bel-Air only the nights get cold
[02:58.58]I wrapped a yellow jacket 'round Bey
[03:00.18]It's not lost on me music has my kids sound asleep
[03:03.16]Beyoncé/JAY-Z：
[03:03.58]Oh let's make love in the summertime yeah
[03:07.90]On the sands beach sands make plans
[03:10.83]To be in each other's arms
[03:14.43]Let it breathe
[03:15.15]Yeah
[03:15.95]Let it breathe
[03:20.04]I need to take my time to show you somethin' real so real
[03:28.17]This is real so real
[03:33.41]I want you to come inside right now
[03:37.95]So you know just how I feel how I feel
[03:46.44]Let's make love in the summertime
[03:49.79]Let's make love in the summertime
[03:53.35]Be in each other's arms
[03:56.84]Let it breathe let it breathe
[04:00.48]Let's make love in the summertime
[04:04.70]On the sands beach sands make plans
[04:07.21]To love in each other's arms
[04:14.55]Damian Marley：
[04:27.05]Love
[04:33.24]Love is universal
[04:36.65]Love is going to express itself as a form of forgiveness and compassion for each other
data.trans:
[ti:SUMMER]
[ar:The Carters]
[al:EVERYTHING IS LOVE (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.99]//
[00:01.99]//
[00:02.99]//
[00:03.99]此刻 在这个地方 我和JAY-Z以及Beyoncé在一起
[00:07.65]放慢舞蹈的动作 降低到不一样的速度
[00:15.41]你知道 这是Cool & Dre组合制作的曲子 
[00:18.54]你知道 它让你热血沸腾 
[00:21.55]好吧
[00:23.28]//
[00:28.57]让我们在夏日里缠绵吧
[00:32.66]在沙滩上 海滩上 制定计划
[00:35.75]用双臂紧拥着对方
[00:39.20]让它喘口气 让它喘口气
[00:42.83]我想要深入到你的体内
[00:48.76]此刻的海水是多么湛蓝
[00:53.71]多么湛蓝
[00:58.42]我需要放慢节奏
[01:02.87]告诉你一些真实的东西 那么真实
[01:06.21]那么真实 让它喘口气 那么真实 让它喘口气
[01:12.84]我要你现在就进来 
[01:16.75]那么 你明白了我的感受
[01:21.44]我的感受 让它喘口气 让它喘口气
[01:23.98]//
[01:24.18]我们从未到过离海岸这么远的地方
[01:27.56]我们应该再也不会回来了
[01:30.97]调动你的情绪 大力地撞击你
[01:34.85]告诉我你的愿望 我永远不会厌倦
[01:38.35]你只是把它当成一个游戏在玩 却不愿破釜沉舟 投身战斗之中
[01:43.21]男孩 你知道这样是不对的
[01:45.18]我需要你的爱 我也需要你关心我 
[01:48.81]起起落落 我的动作仿佛在大海中畅游
[01:53.27]//
[01:53.66]让我们在夏日里缠绵吧
[01:57.47]在沙滩上 海滩上 制定计划
[02:00.39]用双臂紧拥着对方
[02:03.69]让它喘口气 让它喘口气
[02:07.64]我想要深入到你的体内
[02:13.18]此刻的海水是多么湛蓝
[02:17.58]多么湛蓝 多么湛蓝
[02:20.92]//
[02:21.24]我把我的沙子带到沙滩上
[02:23.15]穿着羊毛大衣从兰博基尼里跳出来
[02:24.87]地板上铺着地毯
[02:26.41]我们在车座上拥抱 缠绵
[02:28.33]我们试图躲进山里
[02:30.16]我们看着天空变成桃色
[02:31.81]就像夏天的阳光 夏季的夜晚
[02:33.31]仿佛是基督的杰作
[02:35.54]她的味道就像是Corona Light啤酒 清淡微甜 
[02:37.67]挤一点柠檬水加入酒里喝下
[02:39.01]她给我递了一大杯 就在我刚抽完**时
[02:42.40]要是我能永远埋在她的发丝里 那该多好啊
[02:45.88]我没有时间观念
[02:47.30]即使我戴了一块玫瑰金的奥得玛斯·皮奎特皇家橡树概念手表
[02:49.68]我记得那时的夏夜
[02:51.46]枪林弹雨让我失去了活力
[02:53.25]当最坏的事情发生的时候
[02:54.38]拉上夹克的拉链 跑回街上
[02:56.52]在贝艾尔市 只有晚上才会感觉寒冷
[02:58.58]我给碧昂丝裹上一件黄色的外套
[03:00.18]我并不迷茫 音乐让我的孩子进入梦乡
[03:03.16]//
[03:03.58]让我们在夏日里缠绵吧
[03:07.90]在沙滩上 海滩上 制定计划
[03:10.83]用双臂紧拥着对方
[03:14.43]让它喘口气
[03:15.15]//
[03:15.95]让它喘口气
[03:20.04]我需要放慢节奏 告诉你一些真实的东西  那么真实
[03:28.17]这如此真实 如此真实 
[03:33.41]我要你现在就进来 
[03:37.95]那么 你明白了我的感受
[03:46.44]让我们在夏日里缠绵吧
[03:49.79]让我们在夏日里缠绵吧
[03:53.35]用双臂紧拥着对方
[03:56.84]让它喘口气 让它喘口气
[04:00.48]让我们在夏日里缠绵吧
[04:04.70]在沙滩上 海滩上 制定计划
[04:07.21]在彼此的臂弯里享受爱情
[04:14.55]//
[04:27.05]爱情
[04:33.24]爱是普遍存在的
[04:36.65]爱只是自己表现对彼此的宽恕和怜悯的方式
